description: This is a Flutter/Dart source file defining a screen widget for creating or editing notes, including form controls, validation, and interaction with a notes service.

classes.name: NoteEditScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that provides a form for creating or editing a note.

classes.name: _NoteEditScreenState
classes.description: State class for NoteEditScreen managing form state and interactions.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes controllers with existing note data if editing.

methods.name: _onSave
methods.description: Validates form and either creates a new note or updates the existing one via NotesService.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI scaffold with form fields and save button.
